attributes.title: 0/5 but i guess i’ll settle for one star
attributes.review:
This app is absolutely atrocious. What even is the point? Anyone who puts over one star is lying to themselves and to the people! I don’t even know what I was thinking to download such a horrendous app. The app is in no way complex, as well as the president, but navigating the app isn’t too user friendly. The layout is extremely basic and overused. Is there an Obama app I can download?

attributes.title: Don’t download 👎🏽
attributes.review: I recently bought one of the T-shirts from this company.Don’t ask why.It came in today.The shirt had terrible stitching &’ I know DJT always talks so bad about China,but I don’t think without a doubt that they where they made in China.While using the app there were numerous adds popping up forwarding a link to vote for DJT in the next election.THIS IS SO UNPROFESSIONAL !Not to mention the horrible music playing while trying to use the app.Ugh I warned you.

attributes.title: no 💕.
attributes.review: Trumps app downloaded after 7 MONTHS. you heard. It made a screeching noise when i opened it and my dog started crying because she heard donald trumps voice. but it’s ok because she LOVES to eat the orange cheetos 😋. they’re her favorite. She likes to eat them with sometimes a little bit of racist, misogynistic, and pedophilia sprinkled on top 👁👅👁. and the boomers don’t like gen z because we listened to them when they said we can run the world, they’re mad they didn’t have the power we do 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️. brb my house is burning down due to me writing this review.

attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED ME
attributes.review: i was in the middle of texting trump to 8420420 when i was rudely interrupted by a random text🙀 i went to check it out and they said to not download this app! i was outraged😡 i couldn’t help but scream 😱. i went immediately to download the app. when i got here a big x covered my screen and said “no trump trump for you” i couldn’t help but cry 😭😭 i just wanted to download this app!! i knew the only logical response to this was to quickly grab my spare Motorola Droid Biomic and download the app. this time it worked successfully!😃 when i opened the app my phone immediately crashed and the words “NO TRUMP TRUMP FOR YOU” were screamed out at me in a voice that sounded a little bit like trump but more like a squeaking parrot 🦜😕. i continued to try and go on the app but every time the same voice would scream at me 😖😭. i began to cry!! in the middle of my sad times my daughter told me she was homosexual. it was too much for me to handle and i had a heart attack right there on the spot!💔💔💔 i died that day. ☠️💀👻 I WISH I NEVER DOWNLOADED THIS APP!!😞☹️😩😭😤

literally disgusting the app told me to take a picture of my sister while she was sleeping and send it to the president. This app is disgusting and this cheeto of a man is disgusting 😹✨ hope he has fun in hell🔥🙈
